review: She just makes you feel very positive about everything. She explains everything very calmly and focuses a lot on Medical history. Moreover she doesn't believe in giving unnecessary medicines.

She is very experienced doctor , i had 4 miscarriages before i conceived from dr jasbir treatment but after her treatment i delivered a healthy baby without any complications she is a god for me , before her i lost my every hope for child just because of her i full fill my wish for child..**** ** * **** **** *****

I visited her over a year ago, she came in highly recommended but the visit was highly disappointing. I had visited for pcos and a possible line of treatment. She gave me some medicines on my insistence but mostly just snubbed me for not wanting a child and told me that I didn't want to get pregnant it was ok to not treat pcos.* ********** **** ***** ****** **** *** **** **** ** ******** *** **** **** ** ****** **** ** ******* ** *** ***** ********* ** *** *********** **** ** ****** *** **** **** ***** ** ******* ****** *** *** ****** ** *** ** *********** Very unprofessional doctor, would not recommend her to anyone.

I Had visited her for pregnancy checkup. Inspite of knowing my previous history of miscarriage she took my case very casually. Unfortunately I had suffered miscarriage again and she did DNC two times. As she has not done it properly for the first time due to which I had suffered infection and fever. I will not recommended to anyone with any complications history or infect to any treatment.
